---
title: "env_check"
---
<br>

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = ">"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(cuteDev)
```
<br>

### Datasets
```{r}
pos <- 2
name <- "mean"
```
<br>

### Datasets info
```{r}
pos # integer indicating the position of the environment checked
name # character vector of the name of the function that will be checked
```
<br>

### Simple example
```{r}
env_check(pos = 1)
env_check(pos = 2)
```
<br>

### Argument pos
```{r}
env_check(pos = 1) # check all the functions in the environment one step above the local environment(by default)
```
<br>

### Argument name
```{r}
env_check(name = "mean") # check the function "name" in all the environment
```
<br>

### All the arguments
```{r}
env_check(
    pos = 1,
    name = "mean"
) # check the function "mean" in the environment one step above the local environment
```
